channel.title: General Graardor (Bandos Boss) Help in 317
channel.description: Okay, I need a bit of help. I have my bandos boss models in my client. But I don't remember his NpcID. I spawned him once, and attacked him..He didn't attack back. If you could help me find my NpcID or help me with making him attack that would be great!

item.title: General Graardor (Bandos Boss) Help in 317
item.dc:creator: @Websterscape_ftw Websterscape ftw
item.description:
@Websterscape_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Owner_Of_GdogScape, post:5, topic:317270”][quote author=3lou 55 link=topic=413816.msg3047247#msg3047247 date=1259839950]
if its not attacking back its a simple fix

1-go to your server sided open folder > Config > npc.cfg
2-add this

npc = NPCID General_Graardor 624 HP 150

save and run ur server and it should go fine
[/quote]
Thank you but one small correction, I had to delete HP and get rid of the spaces and use Tab.
And also, he does attack back now…But does no damage. How may I go about fixing that?[/quote]

Program it to attack you most likely in npchandler…add hitDiff = misc.random(put damage here) in the method.

Read full topic

item.title: General Graardor (Bandos Boss) Help in 317
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

[quote=“3lou 55, post:4, topic:317270”]if its not attacking back its a simple fix

1-go to your server sided open folder > Config > npc.cfg
2-add this

npc = NPCID General_Graardor 624 HP 150

save and run ur server and it should go fine :P[/quote]
Thank you but one small correction, I had to delete HP and get rid of the spaces and use Tab.
And also, he does attack back now…But does no damage. How may I go about fixing that?

Read full topic

if its not attacking back its a simple fix

item.title: General Graardor (Bandos Boss) Help in 317
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

kneistol:

to find the id go to class5.java and find general graador and there you will find the id

Thanks, This did help. (I would rep if I could.)
Btw my client is a unhackable client. Meaning there are nothing but the cache java application & .config file.
But I downloaded the client I based mine off of and looked in the class5.java.

Read full topic
